7. And that is one reason why I'm not convinced the #Presto turnstile problems are just "groing pains."
6. This is completely avoidable - there are numerous #HF and system design methods to catch and avoid such issues.
5. ... and expecting users to change their ingrained behaviour on a dime, or risk serious damage to components of the new system.
4. That sounds like blaming the user - and it's actually a classing human factors fail: not taking into account ingrained user behaviour
3. ... "Thatâ€™s something the agency says TTC users, who are used to shoving through turnstiles, are prone to do."
